messages.subject: Re: Games
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/27/2003 12:33:36 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: liza sabater
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/27/2003 12:33:36 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
liza sabater <listdiva@...> wrote:
I need ideas for board games. We've done Pokemon, Chinese Checkers &
Trouble to death.
Thing One is 6 and Thing Two is 3.5 :-)
This is the coolest game, and if you care, it deals with math, etc. It's
called Pass the Pigs. You get two cute little pis that you throw like dice and
gather points depending on how they land. Yesterday afternoon we had four adults
and a teenager play this for a LONG time and crack up the entire time. And
even pretty little kids would get it quickly. Cool game.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
